feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom OKLCH theme variables defining light/dark palettes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root div and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing curtain overlay state and rendering the love-letter page with gallery and share section.
frontend/src/components/CurtainCuteAnima: Animation layer rendering floating hearts, sparkles, and particles with motion‑safe animations and reduced‑motion fallback.
frontend/src/components/CurtainCuteEntra: Cute entrance card component with animated hearts, sparkles, and a kawaii heart graphic that scales and fades during reveal.
frontend/src/components/CurtainEntranceO: Interactive entrance overlay handling reduced motion, reveal animation, and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/components/CurtainStarSpark: Generates animated star SVG elements with varied positions, delays, and sizes for a sparkle effect.
frontend/src/components/PolaroidCollageG: Displays a decorative polaroid-style collage with themed images and Valentine's Day text.
frontend/src/components/ShareLinkSection: UI for viewing, copying, customizing, and resetting a shareable URL with validation and alerts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomShareUrl.ts: Manages a user-defined share URL with localStorage persistence and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind setup with romantic-themed CSS variables, fonts, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending custom romantic color palette, fonts, radii, shadows, and multiple animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state describing a romantic SPA webpage, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
